Token.Abstract: This protocol is adopted by classes that wish to control the behavior of an MBFilesystemCache instance.
Called by the MBFilesystemCache to create a filename for a given cache key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The cache key for which the filename is sought.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The filename for the given cache key.

Token.Abstract: Converts the specified cache object into an NSData instance that can be written to a file.

Parameter.Name: cacheObj
Parameter.Abstract: The cache object for which the raw data should be returned.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSData representation of the given cache object, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Converts raw data representing a cache object into the cache object itself. Used to convert a file into an object.

Parameter.Name: cacheData
Parameter.Abstract: The raw data representing the cache object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The cache object created from the raw cache data, or nil if it could not be created.

Token.Abstract: Asks the delegate whether or not the specified object should be stored in the memory cache.

Parameter.Name: cacheObj
Parameter.Abstract: The object that may be stored in the memory cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The cache key associated with cacheObj.

Parameter.Name: cache
Parameter.Abstract: The MBFilesystemCache in which the object may be cached.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the cacheObj should be stored in the memory cache of cache; NO otherwise.

Token.Abstract: Asks the delegate whether or not the specified object should be stored in the filesystem cache.

Parameter.Name: cacheObj
Parameter.Abstract: The object that may be stored in the filesystem cache.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The cache key associated with cacheObj.

Parameter.Name: cache
Parameter.Abstract: The MBFilesystemCache in which the object may be cached.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the cacheObj should be stored in the filesystem cache of cache; NO otherwise.
